item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in April-May at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AðŸ“„ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0Aâ€¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0Aâ€¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
